answers.answer: Hello.It appears that the problem of the toes is somewhere in the lower spine. You may consult a neurologist and get him examined for his nervous system. Also, a lower spine MRI may also help.Regards

question: 80+ yr old man has very sore toes, keeping him awake at nights.  There is no visual sign of abnormality.  They are fine during the day when he is walking. He feels some pain when sitting and finds them to be very painful when lying down for the night.  The pain keeps him awake for about an hour each night and if he wakes up in the night. Diabetes and gout have been ruled out.  Any ideas what this may be and solutions?
title: Sore toes
